title: Makeup That Acts Like Skin Care? Yes, It’s a Game-Changer
description: Discover nourishing products that love your skin back.
excerpt: Shop the best skin care-infused makeup to achieve the clean girl look. These clinically tested products boast natural-looking shades, hydration, and protection.

html:
The Nourishing Foundation

Westman Atelier Vital Skin Care Dewy Foundation Drops

Pros

  • Clean ingredients
  • Great for sensitive skin

Cons

  • Some dislike the smell

“Westman Atelier often refers to its products as skin care disguised as makeup. And, as the name suggests, the brand’s foundation delivers several nourishing ingredients—like pomegranate and ginseng extract—to improve the quality of your skin while you wear it.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Key ingredients: tsubaki oil, ginseng extract, pomegranate extract

Size: 1 oz

Sephora rating: 3.6/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I didn’t want to love this product, but after all the compliments, I had to buy a back up. I have sensitive, dry skin and rosacea. This has been just life changing for me. Leaves me with all-day glow.”

The Barely-There Bronzer

Haus Labs by Lady Gaga Power Sculpt Velvet Bronzer

Pros

  • Blends well for a natural finish

Cons

  • Shade and undertones range is limited

“I know we all have celebrity-brand fatigue, but Haus Labs is the one you actually want to spend your money on—specifically this bronzer. I bought it for the toasty, fresh-from-the-tropics warmth it offers, but after consistent use, I love it for its good-for-you ingredients. Squalane, a nourisher, and arnica, a soother, form a soft caress along the cheeks as the pigment does its job.”– Nerisha Penrose, Beauty Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Fermented arnica, plant squalane, hyaluronic acid

Size: .3 oz

Sephora rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “This bronzer is so smooth and buttery to apply without being too warm for my fair, cool-toned complexion. I use it as a base for my eyeshadow or as my only eyeshadow often in addition to applying in the usual bronzer places.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Plumping Gloss

Valentino Puffer Gloss

Pros

  • Doesn't tingle as much as many other plumping glosses

“I stumbled upon this plumping gloss on a day when my lips were especially chapped and in need of serious rescue. The initial application feels nourishing without being heavy, providing just the right amount of hydration to rejuvenate my lips. Once it sets, I can visibly notice my lips looking slightly fuller, with a gorgeous sheen and a beautifully pouty finish. And the best part? It’s not horribly sticky like that old-school nostalgic lip gloss.”—Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, ceramides

Size: 0.2 fl oz

Sephora rating: 4.7/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I was really impressed with the Valentino Lip Puffer Gloss! The formula is very thick in the best way—it feels super luxurious on the lips without being sticky. It gives a gorgeous, high-shine finish that makes my lips look fuller instantly. What I love most is how moisturizing it is—my lips stay soft and hydrated for hours. Definitely worth the splurge if you’re looking for a gloss that delivers both shine and nourishment.”

The Dewy Illuminator

Saie Glowy Super Gel

Pros

  • Non-comedogenic yet hydrating formula

Cons

  • Contains fragrance, which may irritate sensitive skin

“This standout item in my collection delivers a fresh, radiant glow that shines through even under foundation. Its sheer coverage is perfect for no-make up days when I still want to look pulled together. The ultra-hydrating formula quenches my skin like nothing else I’ve tried—thanks to a powerful dose of moisture-locking squalane. It's also enriched with rosehip oil, which helps brighten and even out my complexion over time.”–Alexis Bennett Parker, Commerce Content Lead

Key ingredients: Plant-derived glycerin, squalane, rosehip seed oil

Size: 1.0 fl oz

Sephora rating: 4.4/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “This product is a total game-changer! I bought it myself and have zero regrets. It melts into the skin, looks flawless and the shade is perfect…not too warm or too pale. The gel like texture is super lightweight and cooling. Gives the prettiest radiant glow without looking greasy. I even use it as a highlighter. Trust me, you won’t regret it.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Sunscreen-Foundation Hybrid

Naked Sundays SPF 50 Mineral Peptide Foundation Tint

Pros

  • Contains both peptides and SPF to reduce wrinkles and sun damage

Cons

  • Not great for those who want a matte finish

“On sunny days when I need reliable, all-over coverage with the added benefit of SPF 50, I always reach for my Naked Sundays Peptide Foundation Tint. Not only does it protect my skin from harmful UV rays, but it also plumps and nourishes, keeping my skin from becoming flaky throughout the day as it so often does. And when it’s time to transition from day to night, a quick extra layer transforms it into a full-coverage finish—and even then, it still doesn't feel too heavy on my face.”–Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Peptides, squalane, niacinamide

Size: 1.0 fl oz

Amazon rating: 4.5/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I recently tried Naked Sundays BeautyScreen SPF 50 Mineral Peptide Foundation Tint, and I'm absolutely in love! The 1 Fair Neutral shade blends seamlessly into my skin, giving me a radiant finish without feeling heavy. I appreciate that it offers SPF 50 protection and is infused with skin-boosting peptides—perfect for my sensitive, acne-prone skin.”

The Ultimate SPF Blush

Ciele Blush & Protect SPF 50+ Liquid Blush

Cons

  • May need to reapply throughout the day

“I adore this blush for its ability to deliver an instant sun-kissed glow while, ironically, helping to protect my skin from sun damage. It layers beautifully over my go-to facial sunscreen, which is a must since my cheeks tend to take the brunt of the sunlight. And if you're anything like me and have a habit of being a bit heavy-handed with blush, you’ll appreciate its wonderfully natural finish. It blends effortlessly, leaving you with a soft, bashful flush.”–Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Allantoin, bisabolol

Size: .19 fl oz

Sephora rating: 4.6/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I don’t write reviews often, but I love this so much that I want others to know just how good it is. I’ve purchased 2 now in the shades Elodie (coral) and Kirsty (beige pinkish pink), and they are both beautiful! I love how easy they apply and they are never patchy, easy to blend and wear well throughout the day, either on their own or on top of foundation.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Moisturizing Balm

Lancôme Lip Idôle Squalane Butterglow Lip Balm

Pros

  • Buildable, non-sticky formula

Cons

  • Not transfer proof; will likely need to reapply throughout the day

“It’s rare to find a product that delivers both vibrant color and deep hydration for my lips without the sticky mess. That’s why I’m obsessed with the Butterglow Lip Balm. From the moment I apply it, I can literally feel it working—there’s a slight tingle and a refreshing touch, courtesy of the peppermint oil. What’s even better is that while my lips soak up all that moisture, the color stays put for hours, so I don’t have to rely on multiple coats of clear gloss to keep my lips hydrated throughout the day.”–Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Squalane, shea butter, jojoba oil, ceramides

Size: 0.1 fl oz

Amazon rating: 4.5/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I love this product! I have been searching for a product that will keep my lips moisturized as well as something with colour. I have tremendous problem with dry mouth and lips. This lip balm takes care of my lips.”

The Hydration Foundation

Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Hydrating Gel Skin Tint

Pros

  • Buildable formula– light to medium coverage

Cons

  • Applicator is messy, as product leaks out of the tube

“Lately, my skin had been feeling dry, and my old foundation started to look cakey far too often. That’s when I decided to switch to Milk's hydrating gel skin tint, and it was love at first application. The foundation melted into my skin, leaving a dewy, radiant finish without settling into pores or feeling overly heavy like some foundations tend to. What’s even better is that it’s packed with hydrating ingredients my skin already loved—like niacinamide and allantoin—so I never have to worry about breakouts or irritation.”– Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, squalane, blue agave extract

Size: 1.0 fl oz

Sephora rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I absolutely love the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Skin Tint. It’s one of those rare products that lives up to the hype. The formula works beautifully on my combination skin that leans dry and is more on the mature side—and instead of clinging to dry patches or settling into fine lines, it smooths everything out and gives me a healthy, hydrated glow that lasts all day. If you do have some dry patches be sure to prep/hydrate your skin - that made all the difference for me!”

The Dewy Concealer

Tower 28 Beauty Swipe Serum Concealer

Pros

  • Lightweight, natural coverage

Cons

  • May crease on dry skin

“I’m always willing to try a new concealer, even though I have the formula I repeatedly return to. However, Tower28’s iteration made me ditch my go-to, mainly because it’s super lightweight and hydrating, thanks to hyaluronic acid. One swipe is all I need to look awake and refreshed, and because it’s practically weightless, I can build it up without fear of looking too cakey.”–Nerisha Penrose, Beauty Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Hyaluronic acid, Centella Asiatica leaf extract, lysine

Size: .22 fl oz

Sephora rating: 4.3/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I have combination skin and tend to have difficulties later in the day due to sweating and transfer to glasses. This has helped tremendously with under eye creasing, and lasts all day long!! It’s a very thin, lightweight formula but still has amazing coverage.”

The Lash-Lengthening Mascara

Dolce & Gabbana Everfull XL Mascara

Pros

  • Streghtens lashes for long-term growth

Cons

  • Might take multiple coats to achieve desired length

“Of all the beauty products I love to experiment with, mascara is the one constant in my routine. I’ve been loyal to the Everfull XL mascara for over two years now, and it continues to exceed my expectations. What sets it apart is its ability to layer without clumping or flaking. It leaves my lashes looking naturally fluffy—never overdone or spidery. What’s more, its hydrating ingredients, like D-panthenol and castor seed oil, transform lash-lengthening into an ongoing journey rather than a quick fix. It’s easily one of the best beauty buys I’ve ever made.”–Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Calabrian orange, D-panthenol, castor seed oil

Size: 0.27 oz

Nordstrom rating: 4.6/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “This mascara comes in a beautiful container! It really makes my lashes look so long and full as well. I love how it applies, but it is a thick mascara so you have to apply it carefully so it doesn’t appear clumpy. This product definitely feels like a luxury mascara.”

The Subtle-Glow Primer

Keys Soulcare Let Me Glow Illuminating Serum & Makeup Primer

Pros

  • Adds a subtle, plumping glow to skin

“I typically steer clear of anything promising a 'glowy' finish, since it usually translates to glitter overload. However, this primer has a glow so subtle and natural, that it just looks like your skin is bathed in the soft, Instagram-worthy golden hour glow. I especially love using it for outdoor occasions, as the light catches on my face, creating an effortless, luminous glow without the need to fuss over highlighting specific areas.”–Moriah Polk, Contributing Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor

Key ingredients: Niacinamide, squalane, rose water

Size: 1.0 fl oz

Amazon rating: 4.5/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I love using this daily! It gives you such a beautiful natural glow! It takes no effort to apply, but makes such a noticeable difference in appearance. I've already bought it twice and am positive that I will for a third time. It's definitely in my top 3 recommended products.”

For this piece, contributing beauty writer Moriah Polk tested a wide range of skin care products. She collaborated with other ELLE editors, who are always on the hunt for the best and latest skin-enhancing innovations on the market.
